entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nicolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nicolet 9:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
